data.title: Through The Looking Glass
data.meta_description: My name is Emily Wells. I am from the tri-state region of NY, NJ, and CT. I went to school at the University of Connecticut, and I currently work in hospitality, marketing, and modeling. I've been creating websites since 1998, and since the passing of Michael Nesmith, decided it was time to create a site
data.text:
My name is Emily Wells. I am from the tri-state region of NY, NJ, and CT. I went to school at the University of Connecticut, and I currently work in hospitality, marketing, and modeling. I’ve been creating websites since 1998, and since the passing of Michael Nesmith, decided it was time to create a site again to honor Michael Nesmith, Peter Tork, Davy Jones, and Micky Dolenz. Here’s a little more about me.

Birthday: November 29

Zodiac Sign: Sagittarrius

Favorite Color: Blue and Pink

Favorite Scent: Vanilla

Favorite Food: It’s a toss up, but either Japanese [sushi, hibachi] or Italian [pizza, pasta]. I also like to cook.

Favorite Drink [non-alcoholic]: My current favorite is cherry Bubly over ice with a splash of Ocean Spray cranberry. I’m also a devoted daily coffee drinker [“… we’ll have time for coffee flavored kisses…” is literally part of what started me drinking coffee at 14 LOL]

Favorite Drink [alcoholic]: Lately it’s been Crown Royal Peach with lemon water, and Captain and ginger is my standard favorite [I work for them too LOL]. I also love any beer.

Favorite Song: “Daydream Believer” has always been my soul-song.

Favorite Movies: The Graduate, Almost Famous, Music And Lyrics, Love And Mercy

Favorite TV Shows: The Office, Schitt’s Creek, Twin Peaks, House, of course The Monkees

Favorite Streaming: True crime docs, obsessed. Any documentary really, or docu-drama.

Favorite Podcast: True Crime Obsessed and I Think Not [I *know* they are at odds with each other now, but I can’t choose]. And naturally, Serial

Favorite Books: I like autobiographies, suspense/thriller/mystery, and generally whatever is trending

Hobbies: Crochet, art [multi-media], recording dreams, collecting clothes, LOL making websites apparently

Morning Person or Night Owl: I have been completely nocturnal since the pandemic

Do you like storms?: My sound machine is literally set to thunder storms

Do you like to travel?: I do, I love any reason, business or pleasure. I also love nice hotels and restaurants LOL.

Strange Thing About You: I sleepwalk, and I dream of things before they happen
